name: 025_gatehouse_give_sword
expected_full_outputs:
Unlocked

Openned. 

Your score is now 10 out of 75

*** Gatehouse ***

You are in the Gatehouse. This sparse but serviceable room guards the entrance to the main castle. Once upon a time it no-doubt bristled with alert guards bearing gleaming arms. Today, it is filled with old furniture, cobwebs, and a musty smell. Dim light filters in from the arrow slits facing the moat while the shadows at the north end of the room hint at the darkness of the main castle beyond.

Upon the wall hangs a Shiny Sword of great antinquity. 

There is a Front Gate to the south and a Foreboding Archway to the north.

There is a Wooden Shelf here. The Wooden Shelf is empty. 

The Royal Hedgehog is here. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

Openned. The Paper Bag contains: a Baked Biscuit. 

With a yelp of grateful delight the starving hedgehog leaps upon the Baked Biscuit and begins to devour them.

The Royal Hedgehog is ravenously devouring the Stale Biscuits and is taking no notice of you at all.

Taken

Your score is now 20 out of 75

With the Shiny Sword in hand you are now armed and dangerous!

The Royal Hedgehog has eaten through half the Stale Biscuits but is still giving them all of its attention.

Your sword is glowing with a faint blue glow.

*** Antechamber ***

You are in a what feels more like a wide, tall-ceilinged corridor than a room. Apparently this is the room-before-the-room, the pre-room before the really, really grand room that comes after it. If so, the next room must be quite something because, back in it's day, this spot was clearly impressive. Alas, like all of the castle, it has fallen on dark times and now feels more sinister than grand. The east and west walls are bare stone with exits to the north and south. 

Near the north exit, on the west wall, there is a small alcove. It appears to have some kind of apparatus in it but you can't see it very well due to the dim light and the Guard Goblin standing in front of it, glowering at you. The whole north end of the room is cloaked in shadows that make you uneasy.

There is a Lit Archway to the south and an Iron Portcullis to the north.

The Guard Goblin is here. The Guard Goblin is holding a Grimy Axe. The Guard Goblin is wearing: a Big Medal.

Your sword has begun to glow very brightly

(with the Shiny Sword)

You attack with the Shiny Sword and the Guard Goblin attempts to parry with the Grimy Axe!

The Shiny Sword surges with power and lethal heft in your hand. A preternatural calm comes over you. You were born for this moment. Your raucous pub crawling days were a mere temporary distraction. You know in your bones that this primal showdown was meant to be and that, with the Shiny Sword at your command, you were meant to win it. Resolute, and with a confidence you have never even imagined having up until this very moment, you stride forward to meet your foe in battle.

The Shiny Sword swings through the air with a blazing-fast assault. The Guard Goblin is slain by the blazing-fast strike! 

Your score is now 25 out of 75

Your sword is no longer glowing.

*** Gatehouse ***

You are in the Gatehouse. This sparse but serviceable room guards the entrance to the main castle. Once upon a time it no-doubt bristled with alert guards bearing gleaming arms. Today, it is filled with old furniture, cobwebs, and a musty smell. Dim light filters in from the arrow slits facing the moat while the shadows at the north end of the room hint at the darkness of the main castle beyond.

There is a Front Gate to the south and a Foreboding Archway to the north.

There is a Wooden Shelf here. The Wooden Shelf is empty. 

The Royal Hedgehog is here. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

The Royal Hedgehog is looking svelte and chipper but not entirely content. It's clearly grateful for its recent meal but keeps looking at you hopefully.

The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

The Royal Hedgehog gives a small squeek of excitement and a yearning look - clearly hoping that you will return its long-time favorite object.

The hedgehog beams at you with gratitude and Loyalty for returning the Shiny Sword. From a hidden fold of its fur it takes out a silver key and, bowing, places it in your hand.

Your score is now 30 out of 75

With the Shiny Sword no longer in hand, you are a bit more approachable.

This hedgehog is on top of the world! It has recently devoured a meal of Stale Biscuits (a rare delicacy among hedgehogs) and now has it's favorite shiny object back. It looks upon you with gratitude and loyal devotion. It sees within you a nobility, compassion, and destiny beyond anything you've hitherto imagined possessing.

The Royal Hedgehog is holding a Shiny Sword. The Royal Hedgehog is wearing: a Red Bandana.

I see more than one key. Please use the full name.

The small silver key glitters in the dim light. It certainly stands out in the otherwise dreary Dark Castle. If you find a glittering silver keyhole somewhere this is definitely the key for it!

The Royal Hedgehog gives a vigorous nod of recognition and looks at you expectantly.

The Royal Hedgehog accepts the key, drops to one knee to proffer the Shiny Sword to you, hilt-first. And then, once you accept it, rises and salutes smartly.

With the Shiny Sword in hand you are now armed and dangerous!
